resources.string:
"Magnifies on-screen content."

"Click the magnifier icon to temporarily turn on magnification. When you touch the screen, the magnifier will follow your finger. Stop touching the screen to exit magnification."

"Press and hold the magnifier icon to change the icon's position on the screen."

"To change contrast and brightness during magnification, see the Settings page."
"Changes dark colours to light ones (and vice versa)"
